summary: When the President of India is kidnapped by Kashmiri terrorists in Locarno, Switzerland, an Indian secret agent is sent to find him and set him free. With the help of an Indian singer he will make the "Impossible" to complete the mission.
cast: Arjun Rampal|Naseeruddin Shah|Priyanka Chopra|Singh Surendra|Yashpal Sharma|Mukesh Rishi|Mohan Agashe|Shawar Ali|Tom Alter|Milind Gunaji|Shabhir|Dipannita Sharma|Arif Zakaria|Ashwani Chopra|John Gabriel|Chetan Hansraj|Jameel Khan|Mumait Khan|Nadeem Khan|Tora Khasgir|Vishwajeet Pradhan|Gaurav Rai|Tej Sapru|Sharat Saxena|Anupama Verma|Rajesh Vivek
title: Asambhav
